widget:CodeSection.description: Search icon must activate a search component inside the navbar. See below the guidelines on how to implement it.

m:MaterialLabel.text: Batman's secret identity is Bruce Wayne, an American billionaire, playboy, philanthropist, and owner of Wayne Enterprises. After witnessing the murder of his parents as a child, he swore revenge on criminals, an oath tempered by a sense of justice. Wayne trains himself both physically and intellectually and crafts a bat-inspired persona to fight crime.

widget:CodeSection.description: To show the search input field try to call open() or hide it using close()
You must specify the event callback after your search is open.
Take note that we are using Search Object by default to handle the search results. You can also create an object and extend it to Search Object so that you can add your custom attribute e.g Hero.
You can add a logic into your search component.
You can add a finish handler into your search component but by default you can just add link value to your search object to set its href attribute.
